statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); prompt="$(printf '\033[1;34m%s\033[0m' "$dir")"; if [ -f /.dockerenv ] || grep -q docker /proc/1/cgroup 2>/dev/null; then prompt+=" $(printf '\033[2;34m %s\033[0m' "container")"; fi; if [ -n "$cwd" ] && cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null; then branch=$(git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then prompt+=" $(printf '\033[35m %s\033[0m' "$branch")"; git_status=$(git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_status" ]; then modified=$(echo "$git_status" | grep -c '^ M'); added=$(echo "$git_status" | grep -c '^A'); untracked=$(echo "$git_status" | grep -c '^??'); status_text=""; [ $modified -gt 0 ] && status_text+="!$modified"; [ $added -gt 0 ] && [ -n "$status_text" ] && status_text+=" "; [ $added -gt 0 ] && status_text+="+$added"; [ $untracked -gt 0 ] && [ -n "$status_text" ] && status_text+=" "; [ $untracked -gt 0 ] && status_text+="?$untracked"; if [ -n "$status_text" ]; then prompt+=" $(printf '\033[31m%s\033[0m' "$status_text")"; fi; fi; commit_time=$(git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false log -1 --format=%ct 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$commit_time" ]; then now=$(date +%s); diff=$((now - commit_time)); if [ $diff -lt 3600 ]; then age="$((diff / 60))m"; elif [ $diff -lt 86400 ]; then age="$((diff / 3600))h"; else age="$((diff / 86400))d"; fi; prompt+=" $(printf '\033[2;37m%s ago\033[0m' "$age")"; fi; fi; lang=""; [ -f Package.swift ] && lang="Swift"; [ -z "$lang" ] && [ -f Cargo.toml ] && lang="Rust"; [ -z "$lang" ] && [ -f go.mod ] && lang="Go"; [ -z "$lang" ] && [ -f pyproject.toml ] || [ -f requirements.txt ] && lang="Python"; [ -z "$lang" ] && [ -f package.json ] && lang="JS/TS"; [ -n "$lang" ] && prompt+=" $(printf '\033[2;33m%s\033[0m' "$lang")"; fi; prompt+=" $(printf '\033[2;37m%s\033[0m' "$(date +%H:%M)")"; echo "$prompt"
